instructions.title: How to use Barcode Generator

steps.title: Select barcode format
steps.description: Choose the barcode type you need from our comprehensive list of 1D (EAN-13, UPC-A, Code 128, ISBN) and 2D formats (QR Code, Data Matrix, PDF417).

steps.title: Enter your data
steps.description: Type or paste the data you want to encode. The tool automatically validates your input according to the selected format's specifications and displays real-time validation errors.

steps.title: Customize appearance
steps.description: Adjust barcode size, colors, margins, rotation, and text display. Use our contrast checker to ensure your barcode is scannable in any lighting condition.

steps.title: Generate and download
steps.description: Preview your barcode in real-time and download it in multiple formats (PNG, SVG, PDF, EPS, JPG). Use batch mode to generate multiple barcodes from CSV files.

proTips: Use SVG format for barcodes that need to scale to any size without quality loss
Enable quiet zones (margins) to improve scanner readability - most scanners require at least 2.5mm
Test your barcode with the built-in scanner before printing to avoid costly reprints
Use Code 128 for alphanumeric data - it's the most space-efficient 1D barcode
For retail products in Europe use EAN-13, in USA/Canada use UPC-A
Generate Data Matrix for small items - it's readable even at 2-3mm size
Use batch mode with CSV import to generate hundreds of barcodes in seconds
Print at 300+ DPI resolution for professional quality and reliable scanning
troubleshooting: Scanner can't read: Increase size, check quiet zones (margins), verify contrast ratio, ensure print quality is 300+ DPI
Invalid data error: Each format has specific character limitations - check the format info panel for allowed characters
Checksum mismatch: Use auto-calculate checksum feature - manual checksums often contain errors
Barcode too large for label: Switch to a more compact format (e.g., UPC-E instead of UPC-A, or Data Matrix for 2D)
Colors not working: Ensure high contrast - dark bars on light background work best. Use contrast checker tool
Batch generation fails: Check CSV format - one value per line, no headers, UTF-8 encoding
